entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
